hypothesis_content.title: BTC Momentum Reversal After Miner Capitulation Signal
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a confirmed miner capitulation event (hashrate decline > 7% over 5 days), a subsequent 3-day momentum reversal in BTC price (positive 3-day return after capitulation signal) will lead to sustained bullish momentum over the next 10 trading days, outperforming the median 10-day forward return by >2%.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Miner capitulation historically marks local bottoms as weak hands exit. VanEck research suggests this is a contrarian signal. The 3-day positive momentum filter avoids catching falling knives and confirms reversal initiation.
entry_conditions: Wait for 3 consecutive positive daily BTC returns following capitulation signal
Enter long BTC at close of 3rd positive day
Current regime is NEUTRAL or BULL (regime confidence > 55%)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 10 trading days after entry OR +8% return, whichever comes first

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median 10-day forward return after entry ≤ +2% OR win rate < 55% in backtest across 2021-2024 cycles.
